translations: adj.电脑的；电脑化的；用电脑处理的
v.用电子计算机控制（computerize 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: 计算机化断层显象；电脑断层摄影术

sentences.sentence: They have computerized systems to ensure delivery of the right pizza to the right place.
sentences.translation: 他们有计算机化的系统来确保把相应的比萨饼送到相应的地方。

sentences.sentence: This is hardly sufficient for us to develop confidence that computerized voting can be fully trusted.
sentences.translation: 这很难使我们对电脑化投票能够得到充分信任产生信心。

sentences.sentence: The firm has computerized its records.
sentences.translation: 那家公司已把记录存入计算机。
